para.sentence: Solutions of the equation \left(1-z^{2}\right)\frac{{\mathrm{d}}^{2}w}{{\mathrm{d}z}^{2}}-2z\frac{ \mathrm{d}w}{\mathrm{d}z}+{\left(\nu(\nu+1)-\frac{\mu_{1}^{2}}{2(1-z)}-\frac{ \mu_{2}^{2}}{2(1+z)}\right)w}=0 are called Generalized Associated Legendre Functions.
As in the case of (14.21.1), the solutions are hypergeometric functions, and (14.29.1) reduces to (14.21.1) when \mu_{1}=\mu_{2}=\mu.
For properties see Virchenko and Fedotova (2001) andBraaksma and Meulenbeld (1967).
